item.title: HDMI AUX Data
item.description: AVI Info Frame HDR Info Frame Name Offset Remark EOTF byte[0] metadata_type byte[1] G.x byte[2] + byte[3] Little Endian 16-bit G.y byte[4] + byte[5] Little Endian 16-bit B.x byte[6] + byte[7] Little Endian 16-bit B.y byte[8] + byte[9] Little Endian 16-bit R.x byte[10] + byte[11] Little Endian 16-bit R.y byte[12] + byte[13] Little Endian 16-bit WP.x byte[14] + byte[15] Little Endian 16-bit WP.y byte[16] + byte[17] Little Endian 16-bit MaxMDL byte[18] + byte[19] Little Endian 16-bit unit: cd/m^2 MinMDL byte[20] + byte[21] Little Endian 16-bit unit: cd/m^2/10000 MaxCLL byte[22] + byte[23] Little Endian 16-bit unit: cd/m^2 MaxFALL byte[24] + byte[25] Little Endian 16-bit unit: cd/m^2

item.title: SwinIR Experiment Summary â€” March 31, 2025
item.description: ðŸ§ª SwinIR Experiment Summary â€” March 31, 2025 1. Environment Setup OS: Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS (noble) lsb_release -a Python: 3.12.3 python3 --version GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Driver: 570.124.06 CUDA: 12.8 nvidia-smi PyTorch: 2.5.1+cu121 CUDA Available: True import torch print(torch.__version__) print(torch.cuda.is_available()) 2. Project Setup Installed Python venv and created environment: sudo apt install python3.12-venv $ python3 -m venv ~/venvs/swinir $ source ~/venvs/swinir/bin/activate Installed PyTorch (CUDA 12.1): pip install torch torchvision --index-url https://download.
